fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Whisk Away: Choose a player each night. They will be transported to a random location, changing their target and affecting their actions.
- Whisk Attack: Attack a player each night. If they are killed, their death will be disguised as a random non-killing role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, your Whisk Away ability will also prevent any protective actions on the target.
- Mischievous Trickster: You cannot be detected by investigative roles.
